sections.heading: 01|Public works relief compensation definitions
sections.text: Effective:January 1, 1979Latest Legislation:House Bill 1282 - 112th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections4127.01to4127.14of the Revised Code:(A) "Work-relief employee" means any person engaged in any public relief employment

sections.heading: 14, inclusive, of the Revised Code apply to all work-relief employees who are injured and to the dependents of such as are killed, whether such injury or death occurred prior to May 17, 1935, or subsequent thereto
sections.text: 14, inclusive, of the Revised Code apply to all work-relief employees who are injured and to the dependents of such as are killed, whether such injury or death occurred prior to May 17, 1935, or subsequent thereto.
